---
title: "Themes"
---

Want to upload a cool new theme for your visit to the website? Just click that button and choose a jpeg from your computer!


```{=js}

<input> type= "button" value = "Upload Image"</input>
const renderFile = () => {
  const render = document.querySelector('img')
  const file = document.querySelector('input[type=file]').files[0]
  const reader = new FileReader();
  
  
  reader.addEventListener('load' , ()=> {
    render.src = reader.result;
  }, false)

  if(file){
    reader.readAsDataURL(file);
  }
}

```

```{=html}

<input type = 'file' onchange = 'renderFile()' >
<br>
<br>
<img src = "" alt='rendered image' id='rendered-image'>
<script> "js/customizing_theme.js"</script>

```



Cool, huh?
